welcomeBackDescription: We are grateful for your support and the difference it makes and helping us conquer cancer in our lifetime.
prize: Win amazing Grand Prize Showhomes and thousands in cash.
eventsSubDescription: Thank you for participating in events! You can access current and past events here.
upcomingEventsInterest: Upcoming Events That May Interest You
noEventsDescription: As soon as you participate in the events, you will have access to current and past events here.
noEventsSubDescription: We did not find any events in which you participated. Please join us in one of our upcoming events as a participant, volunteer or show your support through a donation.
profileFormAlertText: Name, address, and email are required for tax receipt purposes.
profileDescription: Please review and update your information on file.
transactionsDescription: The past two years of giving history and any associated tax receipts are found below.
transactionsInfoAlert: It may take up to 24 hours to update your transactions and receipts in some cases.
transactionTableFooterText: This item is non-receiptable or the receipt has not yet been issued.
notFoundTransactionDescription: We will show your donation history for the last two years and all related tax receipts on this page.
notFoundTransactionSubDescription: We'd love your support! Your donation has the means to make an impact.
contactDetailsAlertText: You cannot opt-out of transaction or event participation based communication.Â
contactDetailsDescription: Please review and update your information on file.
monthlyCommitmentDescription: Thank you for your on-going support through your recurring donations. You can update your commitment information below.
monthlyCommitmentInfoAlert: It may take up to 24 hours to update your transactions and receipts in some cases.
accountSecurityInfoAlert: You cannot opt-out of transaction or event participation based communication.
accountSecurityDescription: Please fill in the following information so that we can communicate with you.
recoveryEmailRightDesc: You do not have a secondary email
recoveryEmailDescription: Your recovery email is used to reach you in case we detect unusual activity in your account or you accidentally get locked out. When you change your recovery email, you may be able to choose to get sign-in codes sent to your previous recovery email for one week. Learn more
recoveryEmailDescLine1: Your recovery email is used to reach you in case we detect unusual activity in your account or you accidentally get locked out.
recoveryEmailDescLine2: When you change your recovery email, you may be able to choose to get sign-in codes sent to your previous recovery email for one week.
emailInvalidError: Please enter a valid email address
confirmEmailUpdateDescLine1: You have updated your Login email address to
confirmEmailUpdateDescLine2: would you like to update your Contact email address as well?
